name: Beware of the submarines
description:
This is a game created for the Low Effort Jam 8. You have to dodge submarines, because they will damage you if you get into their range.

Controls:

- WASD - movement

- SPACE - pause the game

- ESCAPE - return to menu

Warning: Game will be probably broken if your screen resolution is different than full HD (1920x1080).  If you have higher resolution, you can set custom screen resolution in windows settings.
